# Test 1: Wie viel Prozent der Symbole sind rote Dreiecke?

## 

```{r}

simulate.points = function(n, p, seed = 42){
  set.seed(seed)
  points = data.frame(
    x = runif(n),
    y = runif(n),
    color = factor(sample(c(0,1), size = n, replace=TRUE, prob = c(1-p, p))))
  
}
  return()

plot.points = function(points, size = 3){
  p = ggplot(points) + 
    geom_point(aes(x=x, y=y, color = color, shape= color), size = size) + 
    theme_void() + 
    scale_color_manual(guide = 'none', values = c('blue', 'red')) + 
    scale_shape_discrete(guide = 'none')
  print(p)
}
```


```{r}
# simulate 
points = simulate.points(20, 0.1)
plot.points(points)
```

## Zeit ist um!

## Antwort:  `r sprintf("%.0f%s", 100 * mean(points$color == 1), '%') `
```{r}
plot.points(points)
```

## Finde das Maximum {.build}


```{r}
set.seed(42)
get.max.game.numbers = function(maxim, min=0, n=3, sort.numbers=TRUE){
   numbers = sample(min:maxim, size=n, replace=FALSE)
   if(sort.numbers){
     numbers = sort(numbers)
   }
   numbers
}
maxim = 7
numbers =get.max.game.numbers(maxim)
```
